name: prettier-plugin-jsdoc
description: A Prettier plugin to format JSDoc comments.

scripts.release: standard-version && npm publish && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min && npm run build:stats && tsc --project tsconfig.json --module commonjs
scripts.build:stats: (echo '\033[35;3m' ; cd dist && ls -lh index*js index*gz | tail -n +2 | awk '{print $5,$9}')
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/index.min.mjs -- dist/index.mjs && gzip -9 -c dist/index.min.mjs > dist/index.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o dist/index.umd.min.js -- dist/index.umd.js && gzip -9 -c dist/index.umd.min.js > dist/index.umd.min.js.gz

author: Hossein mohammadi (hosseinm.developer@gmail.com)
